articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: Indian stock market: 8 key things that changed for market over weekend - Gift Nifty, US nonfarm payrolls to oil prices | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Indian stock market: Asian markets traded mixed, while the US stock market ended at record levels last week led by a rally in megacap tech stocks. Gift Nifty indicated a flat start for the Indian stock market indices.
articles.content:
Indian stock market: Indian equity benchmark indices, Sensex and Nifty 50, are expected to open on a tepid note Monday tracking mixed cues from global peers.
